title: WPCC - Ultraviolet Disinfection System
description: Separate sealed BIDS for the WPCC - Ultraviolet Disinfection System will be received by the City of Monroe, at the Purchasing Division, located at 1014 Grammont Street, Monroe, Louisiana 71201. Bids will be received until 1:45 P.M., on Tuesday, March 22, 2023. Bids will be publicly opened in the Purchasing Division Conference Room, at the above-mentioned address, at 2:00 P.M.The CONTRACT DOCUMENTS, consisting of Advertisement for Bids, Information for Bidders, SPECIFICATIONS, and ADDENDA, may be examined at the following location:City of Monroe Purchasing Division1014 Grammont StreetMonroe, LA 71201
